5.3.18  8:53 pm   please explain what you mean about the world constantly starting and ending?

5.3.18  7:49 pm   Do you think my dogs are cute?

5.3.18  7:41 pm   5.3.18  8:52 am Why don't you do that thing you did back in 2014, where you had a little spinning disc with the song playing?

     that doesn't quite count as a video to me

5.3.18  7:18 pm   Hi Bill, your music has made me enamoured with tonal music again and I used a key signature for the first time in a long time, but then I realized I'm having trouble writing effective tonal melodies, do you have any tips?

     whatever type of thing you are describing, be sure to listen to it being done plenty. then try it a bit, then listen to some more and try again. in time you should quickly find exactly the ways you like doing things

5.3.18  7:13 pm   hi. are capital letters banned?

     no

5.3.18  6:46 pm   Have you considered animating some of your older music videos (i.e. "new song: i can play")?

     that never had a video but i would consider making videos for any of my songs. if i had time i would do it for all of them. i have done it for some of them. sometimes it's nice to make a brand new song with a video at the same time, but sometimes i make videos for songs after they were released as audio only. such as new canaan, movie star, tuesday, school, i like, and many more

5.3.18  6:33 pm   What're your thoughts on grammatically correct sentences?

     seems legit

5.3.18  5:25 pm   Are practice and experience equally important when it comes to being good at music?

     those 2 things sound like the same thing to me

5.3.18  5:14 pm   Will you ever do a vlog?

     i feel like i've been doing them for years. although the post-production is on hold for most of the time but there was a very productive 3-month post-production session during early 2016 which yielded an intense series of vlogs spanning 2010-2016, which are posted on this site

5.3.18  5:04 pm   5.2.18  9:10 pm Not the asker but that same logic applies to job interviews, right?

     absolutely

     i have it written down somewhere

5.3.18  4:49 pm   What's a 10 piece band called (as in duo, trio, quartet, quintet, etc)? 

     a band, group, orchestra, or ensemble. maybe other names too

5.3.18  4:46 pm   4.30.18  4:18 pm    of course you do, via your local public library, imslp.org, thousands of recordings available on all digital media sources. why do you avoid this question?

     i didn't avoid the question. i don't have access to most of the music before 1650. the majority of music before 1650 i don't have access to. if you would like me to further defend that statement i would be glad to discuss it privately

     that is shocking news and i still haven't gotten a chance to find out how that happened. it seems like a pretty dramatic turn from the hot twitter wars we were seeing last year

5.3.18  4:09 pm   communism or capitalism? which one is satan?

     both. it's satan vs. satan!

     i can only guess, but earth seems like a place with a lot of interesting challenges and valuable lessons to be learned

     it is nice, but i don't do it much anymore

     you just have to learn what they all are called. the knowledge is available anywhere, i'll tell it to you if you let me know which thing you wanna know first

     i just try to make the thing as good as i can

     you have to convince someone else to give you theirs

      no i am one of the fake ones

5.3.18  2:05 pm   How sad are you?

     maybe 2%

5.3.18  1:54 pm   Can you tell me some tips on how to make good poems?

     no one knows what makes a poem good. in fact, no one can say exactly for sure what even is a poem. that is part of the thrill. it's kind of like a who done it

5.3.18  1:31 pm   5.1.18  1:35 pm . That's exactly it, I don't where it's coming from. Some quick research on the internet shows that sound bouncing off of objects other than the microphone is picked up by the microphone, causing small interference. I could email you an example of some staticky audio I've recorded if you'd like.

     that might be helpful

     Anyway, in high quality audio, such as yours,

     don't be so sure

     when there's silence it's actually silent,

     you can make anything silent if you delete the part that's supposed to be silent

     there's not a little buzz in the background that comes from "sound bouncing off of other objects".

     the effect you are describing doesn't sound like it would be a result of that, but i would have to hear it to be sure

     Apparently solutions are to either get a real high quality microphone,

     you'd be surprised at what you can get away with

     or to deck out the room with objects that sound doesn't bounce of, neither of which are in my budget. But you don't seem to have either of those either. So what do you do?

5.3.18  1:26 pm   how much control do you put into creating things and into over which parts of the process?

     i'm not exactly sure what you mean but i think the answer is 100%

5.3.18  1:25 pm   Do you like my spanish teacher

     which one do you have

5.3.18  1:24 pm   kill your self you mother butt

     that seems counter productive

5.3.18  12:56 pm   How come when people reference one of your song lyrics by saying something like 'you said...' you always correct them and say that you didn't say the thing, but sung it in a song? 

     the main time i make that correction is when they say i "stated" something. that's just not quite the same as writing something in a song, and i think it's an important distinction that needs to be made, especially if they continue on to draw conclusions from song lyrics as if they were a statement

5.3.18  12:25 pm   when are you going to post the script of "history of the entire world, i guess" to the expert list like you did with history of japan?

     whenever i can figure out which one of the 200 different versions to post, and clear out all the massive repeated drafts and detours which are in every file

     some of them were written by cole porter

5.3.18  11:15 am   give me a name

     namey

5.3.18  11:01 am   do start animating the music video first or write the song first?

     i always write the song first, even before recording the audio for the song. then do the audio for the song, and when it gets about half-way good i might start working on the video

5.3.18  10:43 am   should I date a british girl? I am an american in NY. 

     you never know who you might meet, and where and when

5.3.18  10:39 am   i am confused with the what playing actually is - when you play like music or like kids you are having fun and enjoying yourself - but there is also the meaning of this word like pretending - pretending to be something you are not - how does pretending to be something you are not or some feelings connect with playing music - or in fact - is it about that you know you are just being a little clown that wants to make others happy when you play music? 

     the word play has a lot of meanings. many words of that size have just endless amounts of meanings, words like "make", or "check", or "key"

5.3.18  10:34 am   how many continents are  their 

     that depends what you count as a continent

5.3.18  9:57 am   i want to finish a song but every time i listen to the idea again it already sounds different and i feel like losing the original idea - and in fact i find more fun in playing new song and more of new songs - so how do you actually finish the song when you - or your mood/ vision/ feel doesnt change that fast?

     keep logging your ideas, but if you don't like them that much then perhaps you should keep improvising/generating new ideas until you get some that still look wild to you, even when you come back to them in the list. beware of what may happen, you will continue generating ideas and get better and better and soon you will have a list of 200 or 300 ideas which actually do drive you wild and you will realize it's impossible to complete all of them in anyone's lifetime

5.3.18  9:55 am   i am playing a lot - improvizating songs out - and i wonder if i should continue improvizing and get better in that or stop and finish some of the songs i improvized out? like record some instruments around or do a whole new song out of it which would sound less improvizational. how do you find the isudzwiuzdb between those options? what could you recommend me please? or ask me something

     keep your eligible song seeds in a list. chronologically by date born is usually the most helpful for me. writing is a different exercise from idea generation, and you basically just need a quiet place where you can do your work. once you're sure that you want to engage in the writing process, some important questions will be: choosing which song to work on, and how far to work on it. during 2012-2013 i had the insane idea that i was going to write just a bit on each one and move on. unfortunately this is not a strategy that will ever lead to completion (because there were hundreds of songs in there), and i worked like that for an entire year and didn't even get close to any kind of completion. (but the good news is i gained worlds of experience, and after that i felt i was a much much stronger writer). but finally i shuffled it up and organized them by percentage of completion and knocked off everything from the 70%s upwards (finishing the writing on those.) then of course you would have a whole other decision making process on which one(s) to record. Another strategy i've been using in more recent years is to make a selection from all the songs (finished or non) and stick with that and complete the writing and recording of that song. this is a good and focused strategy, but the downside is that it can be very hard to feel confident in the decision if none of the songs are beyond 20% written. i guess what i'm trying to say is there are many different strategies for choosing, but the one thing that i'm sure of which i'm trying to tell you is that the writing process is a separate process from idea generation, and you should log all your song seeds into a chronological list, and then go about making a decision on which ones to do and work on writing them. but if you haven't had too much experience in doing the actual 'writing', it might be good to just do a random selection or just go in order chronologically, just to see what goes into the whole writing thing. it's very different from improv/idea generation -- it's much more like being a doctor. you look into the original idea, you make a diagnosis, figure out what it is, where it's going, what it needs, brainstorm on what problems need to be solved, etc, and through hard thinking and trial and error, and a bit of imagination, you can find solutions. it can be grueling for the first few hours but once you have those sweet breakthroughs it can be liberating to know that you can take care of any 'song seed' and take it where it is trying to go. hopefully i've given you some information. as you can see i am still wrestling with some of this myself, mostly when it comes to the song selection strategies

5.3.18  9:49 am   Do you count ballet as a sport?

     i haven't been keeping score

5.3.18  9:36 am   what do you think

     thoughts, and more

5.3.18  9:22 am   is the day goes on is based on your life?

     there are a lot of familiar feelings in it

      or pigs'?

     no pigs, that song is a pig free zone. no offense to pigs i have nothing but high praise and respect for pigs and the pig community

5.3.18  9:13 am   im confused, does thinking actually distract you from feelings? or maybe like - the more you think the less you actually feel real?

     it can be powerful to use them both together
